dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T.L. Berg
dcterms:description: ReferIt is a crowd-sourced database that contains images and referring expressions to objects in those images. Currently it has 130,525 expressions, referring to 96,654 distinct objects, in 19,894 photographs of natural scenes.
dcterms:title: ReferIt

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A.C. Berg
T.L. Berg
dcterms:description: UNC was collected interactively in the ReferIt game, with images that were selected to contain two or more objects of the same object category, consisting of 142,209 referring expressions for 50,000 objects in 19,994 images.
dcterms:title: UNC

dcterms:creator: L. Yu
P. Poirson
S. Yang
A.C. Berg
T.L. Berg
dcterms:description: UNC+ is similar to UNC but has an additional restriction regarding words describing location: expressions must be based only on appearance rather than location.
dcterms:title: UNC+

dcterms:creator: J. Mao
J. Huang
A. Toshev
O. Camburu
A.L. Yuille
K. Murphy
dcterms:description: GRef was collected on Amazonâ€™s Mechanical Turk and contains 85,474 referring expressions for 54,822 objects in 26,711 images selected to contain between two and four objects of the same class.
dcterms:title: GRef
